name: Slickdeals Cleaner
description: Removes ADs, front page junk, and any sponsored or featured sections. Vastly improves new "Redesign View".
additional_info: Switch between classic and redesign views - (Classic) | (Redesign) (Old Before) (Old After) Highly recommended userscript: (Slickdeals Clean URL) * Also use (uBlock Origin Extra) to thwart related adware scripts. Must use (Stylus) to apply style when using this extension.
